description: This is a shell script for managing a MOCA (Multimedia over Coax Alliance) whitelist. It provides functions to add, delete, check, and display IP addresses in a whitelist file, and interacts with system events like firewall restart.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new IP address to the whitelist if it does not already exist, then restarts the firewall.

methods.name: del
methods.description: Removes an IP address from the whitelist if it exists, then restarts the firewall.

methods.name: check
methods.description: Checks for proxy ARP entries and warns if any are not in the whitelist.

methods.name: show
methods.description: Displays the current contents of the whitelist.

methods.name: default
methods.description: Displays usage information if command is not recognized.
